channel.title: Music on Richard's Lullaby
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Richard's Lullaby

item.title: Introducing my favourite band: Re-Tros
item.description: Re-tros, or their full name, Rebuilding the Rights of Statues, is a band from Beijing, China which has three members, Hua Dong, Liu Ming and Huang Jin. They were a post punk band but now they are more experimental and trying to add more elements into their songs. I found this band on Youtube first in 2020. Thanks to a top-rated music Variety Show called “The Big Band” that Re-tros was on it as well, Youtube recommend one of their live show to me.
